item.title: Enable SSL/TLS with Let's Encrypt and Dokku
item.description: Connecting Securely on the Web The HTTPS protocol allows one to connect to websites and web applications in a secure way. The absence of this de-facto standard usually triggers a big red warning on modern browsers. This means that using HTTPS is nowadays a must when creating web pages and web applications that face external users. In practice, it is not straightforward to setup servers so that they use this secure protocol.
